creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; standing frowning woman at center, wearing a yellow blouse, skirt and shoes and orange stockings; blue table with two orange covered books to woman's right; man seated in a green and orange chair in LLC next to table, wearing a tan jacket, brown pants, white shirt and black necktie; background has diamond patterning in brown and orange with black outlines; blue and red borders
inscription: on back in pencil: 905 | on back in pencil: EA 50
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Man and Woman with Books
